genShapeSyst-manual.cc

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 // Generates the csh files needed to submit jobs to propagate errors
00002 // associated with shapes.
00003 // To compile, need to add genShapeSyst to EXTRABINS in GNUmakefile,
00004 // and add CLHEP to link_BToDKTo3piK
00005 
00006 #include <iostream>
00007 #include <string>
00008 using std::string;
00009 using std::cout;
00010 using std::endl;
00011 using std::cerr;
00012 
00013 
00014 #include <iomanip.h>
00015 #include <fstream.h>
00016 #include <strstream.h>
00017 #include <assert.h>
00018 #include <math.h>
00019 #include "CLHEP/Matrix/SymMatrix.h"
00020 #include "CLHEP/Matrix/Matrix.h"

00022 
00023 void check(const char slash, const char trueSlash) {
00024   if (trueSlash != slash){
00025     cerr << "read \'" << slash << "\' which is not \'" << trueSlash
00026          << "\'. Did you give the wrong # of lines?" << endl;
00027     assert(0);
00028   }
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 void readMatrix(HepSymMatrix & matrix, int size, istream & stream = cin){
00033   for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i){
00034     // remove the first '//':
00035     char slash;
00036     stream.get(slash);
00037     check(slash, '/');
00038     stream.get(slash);
00039     check(slash, '/');
00040     
00041     // read rest of line:
00042     const int SIZE = 1000;
00043     char line[SIZE];
00044     stream.getline(line, SIZE);
00045     istrstream lineStream(line);
00046 
00047     // then read the #'s:
00048     for (int j = 0; j < size; ++j){
00049       double d;
00050       lineStream >> d;
00051       matrix(i+1, j+1) = d;
00052     }
00053   }
00054 }

00056 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 int genShapeSyst() {
00058   cout << "enter base name for output file " << ends;
00059   string baseName;
00060   cin >> baseName;
00061 
00062   cout << "enter # of parameters " << ends;
00063   int npar;
00064   cin >> npar;
00065 
00066   cout << "enter " << npar << " parameter lines" << endl;
00067   string * names = new string[npar];
00068   HepMatrix tempParams(npar, 1);
00069   HepMatrix tempErrors(npar, 1);
00070   const int SIZE = 1000;
00071   char line[SIZE];
00072   int nFreePar = 0;
00073 
00074   for (int p = 0; p < npar; ++p) {
00075     // read full line to a temp char* that is then discarded:
00076     cin.getline(line, SIZE, '=');
00077 
00078     // read name and value from line:
00079     istrstream lineStream(line);
00080     char name[SIZE];
00081     lineStream.getline(name, SIZE, '=');
00082 
00083     double param;
00084     cin >> param;
00085 
00086     char plusMinus[20];
00087     cin >> plusMinus;
00088 
00089     double error;
00090     cin >> error;
00091 
00092     // figure out if the param is fixed:
00093     cin.getline(line, SIZE, '(');
00094     if (0 == strchr(line, 'C')) {
00095       // not fixed, take it and increment index of free pars::
00096       tempParams(nFreePar+1, 1) = param;
00097       tempErrors(nFreePar+1, 1) = error;
00098       names[nFreePar] = name;    
00099       ++nFreePar;
00100     }
00101     // read to the end of the cin line:
00102     cin.getline(line, SIZE);    
00103   }
00104 
00105   // Copy tempParams into a final vector of the right size:
00106   HepMatrix params(nFreePar, 1);  
00107   HepMatrix errors(nFreePar, 1);  
00108   int fp;
00109   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00110     params(fp+1, 1) = tempParams(fp+1, 1);
00111     errors(fp+1, 1) = tempErrors(fp+1, 1);
00112   }
00113 
00114   cout << "Found " << nFreePar << " floating parameters." << endl;
00115   cout << "enter " << nFreePar << "x" << nFreePar 
00116        << " error matrix with leading //" 
00117        << endl;
00118   
00119   HepSymMatrix mat(nFreePar);
00120   readMatrix(mat, nFreePar);
00121   HepSymMatrix diag = mat;
00122   HepMatrix trans = diagonalize(&diag);
00123 
00124   cout << "I got " << endl;
00125   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00126     cout << names[fp] << " = " << params(fp+1, 1) << " +/- " 
00127          << errors(fp+1, 1) << endl;
00128   }
00129   cout << "matrix= " << mat << endl
00130        << "diag  = " << diag << endl
00131        << "trans  = " << trans << endl;
00132 
00133   // Check errors and matrix:
00134   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00135     const double TOL = 0.05;
00136     double diff = 1 - errors(fp+1, 1) / sqrt(mat(fp+1, fp+1));
00137     if (fabs(diff) > TOL) {
00138       cerr << "found relative diff of " << diff 
00139            << " between error (" << errors(fp+1, 1) << ") and sqrt of "
00140            << "  matrix element (" << sqrt(mat(fp+1, fp+1)) 
00141            << " )for parameter " << fp << ": " 
00142            << names[fp] << endl;
00143       assert(0);
00144     }
00145   }
00146 
00147   // for each +/- 1 sigma change in diag, generate a new par vector:
00148   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00149     // get fp into a string (they should have had an operator+(int) for this!):
00150     ostrstream fpStream;
00151     fpStream << fp << ends;
00152     string fpString = fpStream.str();
00153 
00154     // shift param fp by + 1 sigma & write new par file:
00155     string parFilePlusName = baseName + "+";
00156     parFilePlusName += fpString;
00157     parFilePlusName += ".par";
00158 
00159     ofstream parFilePlus(parFilePlusName.c_str());
00160 
00161     parFilePlus << "setVar(" << "paramsOnResDK, "
00162                 << names[fp] << ", " 
00163                 << params(fp+1, 1) + sqrt(diag(fp, fp)) << endl;
00164     
00165     // shift by -1 sigma:
00166     string parFileMinusName = baseName + "-";
00167     parFileMinusName += fpString;
00168     parFileMinusName += ".par";
00169 
00170     ofstream parFileMinus(parFileMinusName.c_str());
00171 
00172     parFileMinus << "setVar(" << "paramsOnResDK, "
00173                  << names[fp] << ", " 
00174                  << params(fp+1, 1) - sqrt(diag(fp, fp)) << endl;    
00175 
00176     cout << "Wrote files " << parFilePlusName << " and " << parFileMinusName 
00177          << endl;
00178   }
00179   
00180   return 0;
00181 }

00184 int main() {
